name: Sweet Tree
description:
This is just sugar cookie. NO lemon, NO cinnamon! Just delicious fresh-baked sugar cookies. Enjoy!!

***If you sub CAP Super Sweet, I wouldn't go any higher than 0.25-0.5%
  
  

Steeping:
  
7-14 days

70% VG. 
  
Made with 1.25mg 
  
**You may not reproduce this for commercial use.
  
**You may not post this to other websites.

#EJUICEMAKERS
author: SixStrings952

reviews.text: This is my Favorite 'Simple' Sugar Cookie recipe Out There!! A soft and Delicious Sugar Cookie with a Warm mystery that keeps you wanting to vape more!! This Recipe Just does not get old and is in my opinion the best Sugar cookie there is. Well Done SixStrings!!!
I love it when recipes this simple turn out so tasty.  It's not much more than a sugar cookie, as you describe, but that little bit of cream and hazelnut really boosts it into something better.
